channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Upgrade Vrouter to SL2L
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 5, 08:00 UTC  -  Feb 9, 20:00 UTC

Jan 11, 20:34 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Jan 11, 18:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/02/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/02/2024 20:00 UTC

Service improvement : Upgrade Vrouter to SL2L

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - R821L20
item.description:
Jan 19, 12:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/01/2024 22:45 UTC
End Time : 19/01/2024 10:00 UTC
User impact : 5 hosts were unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2C
Root cause : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/wj9x7tyg65tq
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [RBX2A/RBX2B][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network perturbation
item.description:
Jan 19, 14:04 UTC
Monitoring - Our technical teams implemented a fix to solve the issue. Network perturbation isn't observed since 13:25 UTC.
Our teams are monitoring the situation.

Jan 19, 09:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 16/01/2024 00:00 UTC
Service impact : high latency/loss for some traffic going through the gateway
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue with the manufacturer. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [LIM1][Storage] cluster6060
item.description:
Jan 18, 19:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/01/2024 18:54 UTC
End Time : 18/01/2024 19:14 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : LIM1
Service impact : ssd-002729; ssd-001369; ssd-002096; ssd-001412; ssd-002189; ssd-002259; ssd-002354
Root cause : Hardware issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware Private Cloud
item.description:
Jan 18, 19:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/01/2024 14:27 UTC
End Time : 18/01/2024 14:32 UTC
Service impact : Some hosts in RBX7 experienced network packet errors.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX7
Root cause : Network issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
